reason_leave.reason: Career change to a different industry
Lack of growth or advancement opportunities
Desire to start a personal business
Work environment was not a good fit

software_skills.parent_skill: HR, Sales & CRM, Marketing Design Software

competencies.name: Adaptability
competencies.definition: The ability to adjust to new conditions and handle unexpected challenges.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Reacts to change; adjusts to new tasks.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Embraces change; seeks to understand its impact.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Leads change initiatives; adapts strategy dynamically, ensuring organisational resilience.

competencies.name: Analytical Thinking
competencies.definition: The skill of understanding and solving complex problems through analysis.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Identifies basic patterns and problems.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Analyses data to inform decisions.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Integrates complex data across sources; drives strategic decisions.

competencies.name: Communication
competencies.definition: The capacity to convey information effectively and efficiently.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Communicates in straightforward situations.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Communicates complex ideas clearly in group settings.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Excels in persuasive communication; influences and negotiates effectively.

competencies.name: Conflict Resolution
competencies.definition: The ability to identify, address, and manage conflicts constructively.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Recognizes conflicts and alerts supervisors.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Mediates conflicts directly to find mutual solutions.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Manages complex conflicts, guides others in resolution techniques.

competencies.name: Creativity
competencies.definition: The capacity to think outside the box and generate innovative ideas.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Applies basic creativity to tasks as directed.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Develops new approaches to improve work processes.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Leads innovation initiatives, champions a culture of creativity and experimentation.

competencies.name: Critical Thinking
competencies.definition: The ability to analyse facts, generate and organise ideas, defend opinions, make comparisons, draw inferences, evaluate arguments and solve problems.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Questions facts and seeks clarity.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Analyses information to form reasoned judgments.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Synthesizes and integrates new information, influencing strategic decisions.

competencies.name: Customer Service
competencies.definition: The skills needed to provide support and advice to customers effectively.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Responds to customer inquiries.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Manages customer issues effectively.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Drives customer engagement and loyalty programs.

competencies.name: Decision Making
competencies.definition: The process of making choices by identifying a decision, gathering information, and assessing alternative resolutions.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Makes simple decisions based on clear criteria.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Makes moderately complex decisions considering various factors.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Makes strategic decisions under uncertainty, influences organisational direction.

competencies.name: Emotional Intelligence
competencies.definition: The ability to perceive, control, and evaluate emotions in oneself and others.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Recognizes own emotions and their effects.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Manages emotions and responds appropriately to others.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Uses emotional information to guide thinking and behaviour, improves team relations.

competencies.name: Entrepreneurial
competencies.definition: The ability and desire to develop, organise, and manage a business venture along with any of its risks to make a profit.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Identifies opportunities for improvement.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Develops new ideas and initiatives for growth.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Drives business innovation and strategic ventures.

competencies.name: Financial Acumen
competencies.definition: The ability to understand and apply financial management principles in the workplace.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Understands basic financial terms and concepts.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Analyses financial reports and contributes to budget planning.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Strategises based on financial data to enhance business profitability.

competencies.name: Influence
competencies.definition: The capacity to have an effect on the character, development, or behaviour of someone or something.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Persuades peers with direct data or authority.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Influences cross-functional teams without formal authority.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Shapes organisational strategy and external stakeholders’ perspectives.

competencies.name: Initiative
competencies.definition: The ability to assess and initiate things independently.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Takes on tasks without being told.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Seeks leadership roles in projects, suggests innovations.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Leads projects and strategic initiatives impacting the broader business scope.

competencies.name: Integrity
competencies.definition: The quality of being honest and having strong moral principles.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Adheres to workplace rules and policies.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Demonstrates ethical behaviour, inspires trust.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Upholds and champions integrity in complex scenarios, organisational ethics.

competencies.name: Interpersonal Skills
competencies.definition: The skills used by a person to interact with others properly.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Communicates effectively in direct interactions.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Builds relationships, mediates in team settings.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Masters diplomacy, manages complex stakeholder relationships.

competencies.name: Leadership
competencies.definition: The action of leading a group of people or an organisation.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Directs small teams or projects effectively.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Inspires and motivates larger teams, manages performance.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Visionary leadership, shapes organisational culture and strategy.

competencies.name: Negotiation
competencies.definition: The ability to reach agreements between two or more parties with conflicting interests.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Negotiates simple agreements effectively.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Manages complex negotiations, achieving favourable terms.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Strategically negotiates major contracts impacting the organisation’s direction.

competencies.name: Organisational Skills
competencies.definition: The ability to manage time and resources effectively to achieve desired outcomes.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Keeps personal work area and tasks organised.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Coordinates multiple projects efficiently.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Designs and implements organisational systems on a large scale.

competencies.name: Performance Management
competencies.definition: The process of ensuring that set performance standards are achieved in a consistent manner.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Assists in tracking performance metrics.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Manages and improves team performance.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Leads organisation-wide performance enhancement strategies.

competencies.name: Personal Development
competencies.definition: The commitment to improving one’s skills, abilities, and knowledge.
competencies.beginner_level_description: Identifies areas for personal skill development.
competencies.intermediate_level_description: Actively pursues learning and skills improvement.
competencies.advanced_level_description: Mentors others and drives a culture of continuous personal growth.
